data.title: Actress Joke Silva celebrates husband Olu Jacobs' 82nd birthday
data.meta_description: On July 11, 2024, the actress posted a video containing candid moments of her husband as well as old pictures of them from their youth. In her caption, she acknowledged the auspicious occasion and prayed for him.
data.text:
Nollywood actress Joke Silva has taken to Instagram to celebrate her husband‚Äôs 82nd birthday.

On July 11, 2024, the actress posted a video containing candid moments of her husband as well as old pictures of them from their youth. In her caption, she acknowledged the auspicious occasion and prayed for him.

She wrote, ‚Äú82 just like that ..Agba ko ni nira l‚Äôagbara Jesu‚Ä¶Happy birthday and have an amazing year ahead, darling‚Ä¶ Sir J of life @_olujacobs.‚Äù

The actor‚Äôs fans and well-wishers took to the comment section to wish the veteran a happy birthday, acknowledging his contributions to Nigeria‚Äôs film industry.

A fan wrote, ‚ÄúHappy Birthday, Uncle Olu! You are blessed, highly favoured, appreciated, and you will forever be honoured for being our great ambassador. God keep you.‚Äù

‚ÄúHappy birthday to a legend, a father to the industry, an outstanding actor, and an incredible soul,‚Äù another fan wrote.

An Instagram user wrote, ‚ÄúHappy birthday to one of our greatest and irreplaceable thespians! You are a blessing to us all. May happiness be with you throughout all the days of your lifeü§ç. A legend‚Äù

The couple met in the 90‚Äôs when Olu Jacobs was directing the premiere of Wole Soyinka‚Äôs Jero‚Äôs Metamorphosis for Nigeria‚Äôs 21st anniversary. According to Silva, Jacobs‚Äô told her he was going to marry her the first time they met, but she did not believe him.

True to his word, he asked her to marry him at a restaurant after they had a special dish for dinner, and they married in 1989. They have since welcomed three children, namely Olusoji, Dayo, and Olugbenga.
